channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Missing loved ones leave those left behind with ‘ambiguous loss’ — a form of frozen grief
item.description: Families of missing loved ones face a unique and agonizing grief called ambiguous loss. Experts explain this as the pain of uncertainty when a loved one’s fate is unknown, leaving families in emotional limbo.

item.title: Father arrested in New York in death of 9-year-old daughter he had reported missing
Second suspect arrested in the shooting of an off-duty US customs officer in a Manhattan park
